Record numbers (Sea/Ocean classification): Adriatic Sea: 2 , Indian Ocean: 1 , Ionian Sea: 6 , Mediterranean Sea: 1 , Pacific Ocean: 1 , Tyrrhenian Sea: 1 ;
total: 12 .

Record numbers (FAO classification): FAO 37 : 10 , FAO 51 : 1 , FAO 77 : 1 ;
total: 12 .

Remarks: This species was first described from 30–60 cm depth in intertidal beach sand (Hawaiian Islands), but has since been reported primarily as a subtidal species known from isolated and disjunct localities in the northern hemisphere.
